metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6275 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Multiple CSRF issues in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition 5.1.2 and earlier in basic.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-ingo - 3.1.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-ingo package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
